import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import nurseImage from '../assets/nursing.png' import '../components/styles/ServiceDetail.css' const ServiceDetail = () => { const [showContactForm, setShowContactForm] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = () => { setShowContactForm(true); }; return (
{!showContactForm ? (

EXPLORE OUR SERVICES

Nursing

Point 1

Clear and effective communication with clients, families, and medical professionals.

Point 2

Understanding common health conditions, medications, and their side effects.

Point 3

Knowing how to handle emergencies and basic first aid procedures.

Point 4

Documenting daily activities, changes in health, and any incidents.

) : (

Enter Contact Details

) }
); }; export default ServiceDetail;
